await apply_backup(self, code)¶

|coro| It applied backup with the backup code specified

:param code:Backup Code :type code: int :return: str is returned when there is a error otherwise a bool with True value :rtype: Optional[Union[str, bool]]

Parameters

Return type

Optional[Union[str, bool]]
